product_name: FalconGuides Mountain Biking Lake Tahoe: A Guide to Lake Tahoe and Truckee's Greatest Off-Road Bicycle Rides
long_description: Up and down spectacular peaks, past ultra-blue lakes, through crisp, clean air--find profiles of the greatest rides in this cycling paradise.
short_description: Up and down spectacular peaks, past ultra-blue lakes, through crisp, clean air--find profiles of the greatest rides in this cycling paradise.
